data.title: Nominations for the Nobel Prize in Literature 1901
data.text:
The number of nominations presented here are the total number of nominations that particular year – not the number of suggested individuals, nor the number of approved nominations the particular Nobel Laureate received that year.

All information concerning the nominations and selections of the Nobel Laureates is kept secret for 50 years, that’s why we have only published information about the first 50 Nobel Prizes in Literature so far.

Year Nobel Prize was awarded Nobel Laureates Nomination year Total number

of nominees this year

(not only to that particular Nobel Laureate) 1901 Sully Prudhomme 1901 25 1902 Theodor Mommsen 1902 34 1903 Bjørnstjerne Bjørnson 1902, 1903 25 1904 Frédéric Mistral,
